overview:
A confident and enterprising Salesperson with excellent experience in the financial services industry. Proven analytical and decision making skills, with the ability to maintain and develop relationships, working within tight deadlines in pressurised environments.

• Competent and hard working goal orientated team player with good communication skills. • Experience in Sales and Finance on small size infrastructure projects. • Comprehensive background in FX, Treasury & Cash Flow Management. • Excellent skills in Financial Models, Business Cases and Excel Modeling.
